description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This performance-driven version is developed from moisture-wicking stretch jersey.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 32½" body length (front and back), a 23" shoulder, and a 56" chest.
Size Tall 2L has a 34½" body length (front and back), a 23" shoulder, and a 56" chest.
Left chest patch pocket. Even vented hem.
Signature embroidered Pony at the chest pocket.
